data.title: Good place to eat
data.text: Sometimes they put too much mustard on their Cuban sandwiches and should have more ham / less pork but overall it's tasty... as are their soups.

data.title: Awesome Sub
data.text: Incredibly friendly and helpful staff. The workers and managers are so courteous and always make small talk and really make you feel welcome. We ordered a large philly and a large turkey & pastrami. The subs were incredible and gigantic. The philly meat was freshly made and piping hot. I am usually a glutton, but was able to be full after half my sub and brought the other half home. My dad tried his hardest to finish the philly and was so full afterwards. I am so happy I found this place and would gladly go back.

data.title: A great sandwich shop: Try this place.
data.text:
Mr. M’s Sandwich Shop was opened at this same location in January of 1979 by husband and wife, Dennis and Ginny Maier. It is still owned and operated by them and proudly going on it’s 30th year in business. Mr. M’s is frequented by customers who originally came to eat with their parents and are now parents themselves. There are customers who have left the area for years and come back to visit, come in to the restaurant and are amazed to find everything the same and even more amazed that the food is still top quality and delicious. It has often been noted that Mr. M’s Sandwich Shop has become a landmark in the Dania Beach/Hollywood area. At Mr. M’s they take pride in their service to the customers, the quality of the food, the cleanliness of the establishment and their friendliness. In these times of many restaurants opening and closing they take their long standing in their location as a message that they are doing things right. That is why it is so important to everyone who works there to pay attention to even the smallest details, so they can maintain their success.

Of course no successful business or owner does it on their own. Janet, Willie, and Paul (Dennis & Ginny’s Son) have been a part of Mr. M’s for many years and share in the commitment you need to operate any business successfully, especially a restaurant in business for 30 years. Dennis and Ginny and the Mr. M’s family will never take any customer for granted or serve any food that is not top quality.

They ask us to please come in and try us! They promise you that  you will never taste fresher soups, salads and sandwiches and willl be back for another taste!

All this being said, the prices are a bit high for a sandwich, but they are HUGE, tasty and delicious. The customer service is awesome, and they really do have a great menu, staff and the food is incredibly fresh. They offer all sorts of deals on multiple purchases (lunch specials), and they cater to all types of food requirements. They easily accommodated a relative with special dietary considerations (vegetarian) and even changed out their gloves/utensils when cooking for her! All in all, its a great place to try.

data.title: good sandwich
data.text: Sandwiches tasty and a little pricy. Salad was great. My pastrami was flavorful, but not the best meat that I have ever had.

data.title: A GREAT SANDWICH
data.text:
Mr. M's is by far one of the best sandwich shops in town. Whether your eating at the shop on Stirling Road or at the shop on University Drive in Davie you are going to have one great sandwich.

The best part is the fresh bread.  No other sandwich shop can match it. They have a wide selection of sandwiches (hot & cold) as well as salads.  A very extensive selection.

Highly recommend!!!
